data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: There are amps made specifically for bass guitars but if one is not available a keyboard amplifier will work well. Keyboards ____ a ____ bass ____, ____ keyboard ____ are ____ to ____ the ____ notes ____ a ____ guitar. Using a guitar ____ also ____ if ____ bass ____ is ____, ____ the ____ frequency ____ will ____ come ____ well. Guitar amps are only designed to produce 80 Hz notes, so the low A (55 Hz) and the low E (41 Hz) of a bass are too low for a guitar amp.
data.partBlankContent: There are amps made specifically for bass guitars but if one is not available a keyboard amplifier will work well. Keyboards ha__ a de__ bass ra___, s_ keyboard am__ are ab__ to repr_____ the de__ notes o_ a ba__ guitar. Using a guitar a__ also wo___ if n_ bass a__ is avai_____, b__ the lo___ frequency no___ will n__ come thr____ well. Guitar amps are only designed to produce 80 Hz notes, so the low A (55 Hz) and the low E (41 Hz) of a bass are too low for a guitar amp.
data.answer: 有专门为低音吉他制作的放大器，但如果没有，键盘放大器也很好。键盘的低音范围很广，所以键盘放大器能够再现低音吉他的低音。如果没有可用的低音放大器，使用吉他放大器也可以，但较低的频率音符将无法发出。吉他放大器只能产生80赫兹的音符，所以低音的低A(55赫兹)和低E(41赫兹)对吉他放大器来说太低了。
